Hiya Debbie
   
  I can hear most of that same as you did especially when they give his name that was very clear for me (this time hehehe) and pretty direct replies to you. Great stuff!!!!
   
  Misty

misujoey <Debbie@...> wrote:
          It was really hard for me to speak to a "Box" to ask for my Son .. I 
tried it and I believe it might be working .. I uploaded some files 
under "Debbie's Recordings - MiniBox - Messages from Heaven - maybe??

Debbie
